content: SPX coating removal Ultimate diamond cup wheel for for angle grinders – for removing thin coatings such as paint and adhesive ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Diamond blades and cup wheels- - - ### FEATURES:Features Faster coating removal – the larger abrasive diamonds are especially effective at removing thinner coatings Ultimate lifetime – steel body engineered to remove dust more effectively, helping to prevent clogged abrasive surfaces Advanced cooling – patented cooling pins help to prevent damage to the cup wheel segments due to overheating Robust – these cup wheels are built from the highest-grade materials using durable contact welding Minimized vibration – every cup wheel is individually checked and balanced before leaving the plant Applications Removing thin coatings such as adhesive and paint ### TECHNICAL DATA: Tool type: Cordless angle grinder, Corded angle grinder Base material: Coatings, Adhesive, Paint Product Class: Ultimate Technical Data | Tool type | Cordless angle grinder, Corded angle grinder | Base material | Coatings, Adhesive, Paint | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2238548 - Diamond cup DG-CW 4.5 SPX coatings - Package Size 1 pc - 2238549 - Diamond cup wheel DG-CW 5 SPX coatings - Package Size 1 pc - 2238550 - Diamond cup wheel DG-CW 7 SPX coatings - Package Size 1 pc
